summary: Take away blood and other inappropriate stuff, rendering Skyrim \"PG-13\"! Also take away gore with a few easy steps! Finally, you can play Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Don\'t want blood and gore?
Look at Skyrim\'s rating. 
With this modpack, Skyrim will become as if it\'s: TEEN for suggestive themes and violence.
That\'s right! Finally convince your parents to let you play Skyrim.
Use my mod along with Citizen86\'s no blood mod (included in pack).
Also includes instructions to turn off gore in Skyrim.

NOTE: Brinaq is not affiliated with Citizen86
There will be a small splash of blood in the very beginning, but that will be all.
View Citizen86\'s no blood mod on this website for more details on that.

My modification edits a few \"inappropriate\" things out of the game.
And the instructions to take away gore works, no downloads required!

Please read all the readme\'s and notes included in the pack!
author: Brinaq
